--- title: "Simple Documents" subtitle: "rstudio::conf(2022)
From R Markdown to Quarto" author: "Andrew Bray" footer: "[rstd.io/rmd-to-quarto](https://rstd.io/rmd-to-quarto)" format: revealjs: theme: ../slides.scss multiplex: true transition: fade slide-number: true incremental: true center: false execute: freeze: auto --- ## Introductions Please take ~2 minutes to introduce yourself to your neighbors. Share: 1. Your name 2. Where you’re from 3. What you work on in 3 words or fewer 4. Name one thing you’ve made that you’re proud of ## Workshop Resources [rstd.io/rmd-to-quarto](rstd.io/rmd-to-quarto) ## Workshop Schedule Table from website ## Communication: stickies During an exercise, place a green sticky on your laptop if you're good to go and a pink sticky if you want help. zzq add photos ## Workshop Discussion If you have a question that you think will be useful to everyone or useful to have on record, post to [https://github.com/rstudio-conf-2022/rmd-to-quarto/discussions](https://github.com/rstudio-conf-2022/rmd-to-quarto/discussions) # Quarto Gallery # Quarto Overview ```{css} #| echo: false h2 { text-align: center; } ``` ## What is a document? :::{.bigadage} [A document]{.fragment} [is a list of block elements]{.fragment} [that contain inline elements or other blocks.]{.fragment} :::
